content:
The blow came across apartment buildings of Shevchenkivsky district of Kharkiv.

About thisdeclared March 27Mayor Igor Terekhov.

“There are dead and injured. This is another act of bloody terror against Ukrainians, ”Igor Terekhov said.

Oleg Synigubov, Head of Kharkiv Regional State Administrationspecifiedthat the invaders made two beats.

“The type of weapons is set. Previously: there are victims. Civil housing infrastructure was damaged. The data is updated, the services inspect the places of hits, ”Oleg Synigubov wrote.

Asreported the Armyinform,There are 6 victims in Nikolaev as a result of a Russian rocket strike.
title: Russia hit the Kharkiv residential district
description: Mayor Igor Terekhov stated this on March 27. “There are dead and injured. It...
author: Army Inform
